document.docAuthor: Liu, Yang, Qin, Dao-Zheng, Fletcher, Murray J. & Zhang, Ya-Lin
document.masterDocTitle: Review of Chinese Empoasca Walsh (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae), with description of seven new species and some new Chinese records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of Chinese Empoasca Walsh (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae), with description of seven new species and some new Chinese records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Empoasca ( Empoasca ) affinis Nast, 1937
— China (Xinjiang), India , Poland , Bavaria, Frisian Islands.

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) albipennis Dworakowska, 1977
— China (Yunnan), Vietnam .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) alinka
Dworakowska, 1981
— China (Hainan), India .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) altaica Vilbaste, 1965
— China (Henan), Russia , Mongolia , Korea .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) amasa
Dworakowska, 1984
— China (Hainan, Yunnan), Malaysia .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) ariadnae
Dworakowska, 1968
— China (Shaanxi, Yunnan, Hunan, Guangxi, Jiangxi, Zhejiang), Korea .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) cisiana
Dworakowska, 1971
— China (Guangdong).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) dendritica
Liu & Qin, 2011
— China (Yunnan).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) fabae (Harris, 1841 )
— China (Guangdong, Guangxi, Shaanxi), North America , South America .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) flavescens (Fabricius, 1794 )
— China (Northeast China , Inner Mongolia , Henan, Hebei, Shaanxi, Shandong, Jiangsu, Anhui, Zhejiang, Hubei, Hunan, Guizhou, Sichuan, Fujian, Guangxi, Taiwan , Guangdong, Tibet), Russia , Korea , Japan , India , Sri Lanka , Africa, Europe, North America .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) fletcheri
Dworakowska, 1984
— China (Hainan), Malaysia , Burma .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) furcata Vilbaste, 1968
— China (Shaanxi), Japan , Korea .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) gucia Dworakowska, 1977
— China (Hainan), Vietnam .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) hiromichii (
Matsumura, 1931
)
— China (Zhejiang, Jiangsu), Japan .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) interrupta
Dworakowska, 1976
— China (Hainan, Guangdong, Yunnan), Indonesia .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) jigongshana
Cai & Shen, 1999
— China (Henan).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) kaicola
Dworakowska, 1982
— China (Henan).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) kantipurensis
Thapa, 1985
— China (Yunnan), Nepal .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) kudlata
Dworakowska, 1981
— China (Hainan), India .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) limbifera (
Matsumura, 1931
)
— China (Henan, Ningxia, Sichuan, Guizhou, Anhui, Guangxi, Hubei, Yunnan), Japan .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) lipcowa
Dworakowska, 1982
— China (Fujian).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) longa
Liu & Zhang, 2011
— China (Zhejiang, Hunan, Guangxi).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) lutowa
Dworakowska, 1971
— China (Shaanxi), Korea .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) majowa
Dworakowska, 1981
— China (Guangdong, Yunnan), Vietnam .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) matsudai
Dworakowska, 1972
— China (Henan), Japan , Korea .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) megalophylla
Liu & Qin, 2011
— China (Jiangxi, Guangdong, Hainan).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) mochidai
Dworakowska, 1972
— China (Jiangsu), Japan .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) mona
Dworakowska, 1994
— China (Yunnan), India (Sikkim).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) motti Singh Pruthi, 1940
— China (Yunnan), India , Nepal .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) paragucia
Liu & Fletcher, 2011
— China (Yunnan).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) paraparvipenis
Zhang and Liu, 2008
— China (Guizhou, Yunnan, Sichuan).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) parvipenis
Dworakowska, 1994
— China (Yunnan), India (Sikkim).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) polyprocessa
Liu & Fletcher, 2011
— China (Fujian, Hunan, Hainan).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) profusa
Ahmed & Samad, 1972
— China (Hainan), Pakistan .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) reducta
Dworakowska, 1976
— China ( Taiwan ), Vietnam .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) rybiogon
Dworakowska, 1971
— China (Zhejiang, Jiangsu), Korea .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) shokella (
Matsumura, 1931
)
— China ( Taiwan ).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) simbava
Dworakowska, 1981
— China (Yunnan), India .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) spirosa
Dworakowska & Viraktamath, 1979
— China (Hainan), India , Sri Lanka .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) tanova
Dworakowska, 1980
— China (Yunnan, Guangdong), India .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) todo (
Matsumura, 1931
)
— China (Guizhou), Japan , Russia .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) undulata
Liu & Zhang, 2011
— China (Hunan).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) uniprossicae
Sohi, 1977
— China (Sichuan), India .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) vickiae
Liu & Fletcher, 2011
— China (Hainan).

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) vietnamica
Dworakowska, 1972
— China (Guangdong), Vitenam

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) vitis (Goethe, 1875 )
— China (Fujian, Jiangsu, Anhui, Hubei, Zhejiang, Henan, Hunan, Guangdong, Guangxi, Sichuan, Yunan , Guizhou, Hainan), Japan .

Empoasca ( Empoasca ) yanhuang Kuoh, 1981
— China (Tibet).

Empoasca ( Matsumurasca ) biloba Qin & Zhang, 2008
— China (Hubei, Hunan, Sichuan).

Empoasca ( Matsumurasca ) biprocessa
Qin & Liu, 2011
— China (Yunnan).

Empoasca ( Matsumurasca ) clypealata Qin & Zhang, 2008
— China (Yunnan).

Empoasca ( Matsumurasca ) dentalis
Qin & Liu, 2011
— China (Hunan).

Empoasca ( Matsumurasca ) diversa Vilbaste, 1968
— China (Liaoning), Soviet Maritime Territory, Korea .

Empoasca ( Matsumurasca ) onukii Matsuda, 1952
— China (Zhejiang, Hainan, Hunan, Sichuan, Fujian, Yunnan, Henan, Gansu, Hebei), Japan , Vietnam .

Empoasca ( Matsumurasca ) parvifacia
Dworakowska, 1994
— China (Shaanxi, Yunnan), India (Sikkim).

Empoasca ( Matsumurasca ) quadrialata Qin & Zhang, 2008
— China (Sichuan, Yunnan).

Empoasca ( Matsumurasca ) spinalis
Qin & Liu, 2011
— China (Henan).
